title: Saar Biotech- Cetirizine Suspension|Third Party Manufacturing Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi) Excise free zone is manufacturing a  cetirizine hydrochloride Which is an antihistamine that treats symptoms, such as itching, runny nose, watery eyes, and sneezing from hay fever (allergic rhinitis) and other allergies, such as allergies to molds and dust mites. It is available in generic form. Common side effects include: drowsiness, fatigue, dizziness, and dry mouth .
